values:
ok so i decided this journal feels dirty.
im starting over.

 

add me. its important.

got it?

im cleaning my room.
its messy.
my panties look like shorts. so im allowed to wear them even when we have company.
my mom said so.
i played in the water today.
and jumproped.
it was fun.
now im going to go blow bubbles.
and organize my new purse.
and ill STILL be in my underwear!

jordans dumb.
hes like.
i cheated on you a whole lot.
but you kept giving it up so i stuck around.

im like. yeah i cheated on you too. but.
you kept buying me shit. so i stuck around.

its funny. that my boyfriend now is the guy i used to cheat on jordan with the most.

and the girl i used to cheat on jordan with the most is my closest friend. even though she makes me want to kill her sometimes.

...
i had sushi last night. with vavas, michael, and my eric.
then i got really really stoned and i couldnt feel my hips.
then i had sex all night.
...

ladies and gentlemen. my exboyfriend is an idiot.

he wrote me a song.
not any song.

a fucking BEAUTIFUL song.

its going to replace thirty seconds on the US release of excess betrayal.
thirty seconds is going on the new record.

my boyfriends famous and thats adorable.
i want to be christina aguilera when i grow up.

"She has some ideal girlfriend traits, in the sense of being ridiculously good looking and dirrrrty. But she is taken and I still know damn well she would shred my heart like an incriminating document."

prettyprettygun [font color=yourusername][b]yourusername[/b][/font] replace the [] with <> to find your true color. ~Basics~ Name:.: vanessa Sex:.: girl Hair:.: black Eyes:.: brown Height:.: 5'7'' Weight:.: 125-130 lbs. Religion:.: fairytale-ism Race:.: white Zodiac:.: virgo ~Emotion~ What emotion best describes you?: danny says lust. What is your favorite emotion?: obsessed What emotion do you less feel?: boredom What emotion do you always feel?: silly What emotion do you hate?: this section is lame. .:Sadness:. What does it take to make you cry?: a cup dropping on the floor. Do you cry alot?: less now that im medicated. Are you depressed a lot?: see above... About how many times this week have you cried?: None. Do you enjoy crying?: In a way. I wear my tears with pride. Do you get embarassed when you cry?: not at all. Where do you cry?: Wherever. Why do you usually cry: 1. confusion 2. love or 3. attention What do you do to make yourself happy?: work out. cry. make something. Or what does someone else have to do to make you happy?: he says he loves me. and means it. What made you cry your heart out more than ever?: when my daughter died. .:Joy:. If so, how much are you happy?: was this translated from chinese? What made you happier than ever in your life?: i won him. Is it easy to make you happy?: actually, yes. Do you like it when others are happy?: very much What do you do when you are happy?: get drunk and have sex. Do you like being happy?: yes. unless its boring happiness. like. contentment. thats not good enough. .:Fear:. Do you get scared alot?: sometimes. What scares you?: fat Do you think you are paranoid?: a little. Do you constantly jump to things that other people don't jump from?: No. thats dumb. Flinch to things? (Loud Noises, flashes, etc.): i flinch when alex gets too close. Do you scream from scary movies?: i scream at beetles. .:Anger:. Are you angry a lot?: not really. Do you get mad at people a lot?: annoyed. not mad. Do people think that you are dangerous when you are angry?: yes What do you usually do when you are angry?: cry. say mean things. hurt people. Do you enjoy being angry?: a little... ok. well a lot. ~ Favorites ~ Animal:.: kittens horses skunks and cats and pugs. Food:.: water. Color:.: pink. black. aqua. Flower:.: roses. or violets. Movie:.: my leg itches and im sick of this survey. Band:.: katie says its time to go. Song:.: i bought new stuff today. Game:.: ok im so done with this survey.

"hollywood: babylon reborn... with santa monica sodom and glendale gahmorra as its suburbs"

he sang me three songs.

i said: i hate you.
tell me your real secret he said.

and i threw my arms around his neck:
i love you.

i got new platforms, a straw n polkadot purse, a rhinestone bracelet, a black halter, a neon green and black lace tank, a baby pink gingham tank, a pink n black tube top, a makeup bag, mothers day presents for alex, mom, and eric, annnnd... some eye shadows/liners. andrew called me. WHY??? i dont talk to dumb boys. they annoy me. i talk to these boys: jordo josh danny and danny. and not very often. i woke up at three and called eric. he was still away. we talked til five. i saw him today. i swear to god ill marry him. alex is shopping for our wedding present. i suggested a coffee maker. she says her mom is buyin us that. tomorrow night we are drinking wine and watching alice in wonderland. how fucking awesome is that. he loves me. i can tell by the way he touches me. and looks at me. and kisses my neck while i fix my hair in the mirror. lots of people are dumb at me because rosebud is annoying. joy. katie is sleeping. im being quiet. a letter to a german boy from MY boy: "the girl... we've been spending alot of time together... i like her alot, she makes me happy... i don't need to have 5 different girls to balance, if one makes me happy, i stick with her...vanessa is very cool..very artistic, compasionate, sweet, thoughtful and beautiful. she is good to me and very patient with my situation with haven and stuff...she's electric!" im so hot im ELECTRIC. wow. the most disgusting thing in the world according to my mom at 5.40 pm: the neighbors have a portapotty in their yard for the construction workers who are doing their addition and the poopy sucker is taking the crap and they whole street smells like ew. katie is mumbling.

GUESS WHAT I JUST GOT!!!

i am very very very excited about this.

 

 

ten days left of school.

im having a white trash themed graduation party. you are all invited. unless i dislike you and you are a weird stalker and read my journal. like a certain SOMEONE who wants to run me over with a car.

eric is my boyfriend. i firmly resolve NOT to fuck this up. i WONT. hes my rock star. and im his little rocknroll.

lets stress the little.

time to go back to school.

oh. tommorow in the mail im getting cute shoes, a purse, makeup, work out stuff, pills, and other things i forgot. im quite excited.

that is all.

if you want to go let me know and ill add you to the list.

itll be great fun.

eric and i went to dinner. hes wonderful.

rosebug pierced her nipples.

i will call my kristine. she needs a someone. and i want to be there for her.

im his. forever ive wanted to belong to him. now he belongs to me.

my nipple itches. excited, boys? oh i bet.

DISNEYLAND! yaaaaaaaaay!
but not for a month. 

i met all the boys at his work. they are nice. except johnny. hes henjo. is that how you spell it? hen-yo, phonetically.

shower nap erics.

he said this: you looked fucking adorable today.

this week i bought: a kimono, ab exercising machine, pilates kit, big ass leopard print bag, white watch, and a locket for kristine. 

jealous, arent you?

i will dream of you between nightmares and wars, and toss and turn.

it used to be ok... this once a week slumber party making out coffee and cigarettes.
but its not enough anymore.

i want him ALL the time.

ill be in the new video for thirty seconds.

he calls me "love".

im working out at least once a day. and trying hard not to binge. 

rosarito in july.
state board in june.
video june.
graduate may.

they actually have little graduations at my school of beauty. how absolutely retarded. i better get flowers.

i want to sleep tonite. i want my headache to go away.

i gave him the bear. he loved it.

katies mean to me sometimes.

when things get real i run.
im sorry. id just rather live in a fairytale.

cramps. two vicodin. sleep...

school. couldnt find my phone. disconnected all day.

home. help you how?

then i went there. where things are not just ok. they are perfect. everything stops its frozen. its better. its silent. and it fills me up. im not hungry angry sad confused hurt remorseful. just. good. 

til you call. throwing me back to reality. 

i try to turn my back. but your phone calls keep tapping my shoulder.

when things get real i run.
im sorry. id just rather live a fairytale.




xxx.

she doesnt want to see me. its not romantic this time. its not the sixteen year old obsession. its just that... she and i are sisters. from another planet and another time. did she forget? why cant she remember the boxes of rose petals and the violets and aminal and the journal and poetry and photographs the drawings and phone calls and letters and tears and first kisses over and over. neither of us will ever ever feel that way again. she seems to be ok with it. im not.


xxx.

daughters home. i spent saturday nite asleep. 


i dont like me right now. my weight my skin my hair. 

a boy brought me a flower today. third boy to ever do so. 
the first was anthony. when i was five or six. then jordan for my prom. and once for valentines day. 

then danny. that was really sweet.







bottom line. sorry i hurt you. i just get scared.

that. is hot. im gonna be snow white for halloween.

Hysteroid Dysphoria. Whether or not you want to
know; whether or not you're aware of it;
whether or not you'll admit to it: you're an
emotional slut. You're suffering from a
chemical depression. Your subconscious knows
the stuff that'll cure what's ailing you. A
"pleasure cocktail" called PEA. The
most convenient way your subconscious has
reasoned to yeild PEA is for you to fall in
love...many times. But, because infatuation
wears off, so does the PEA. Consequently,
you're also falling out of love a lot. Get
used to obsessive love, chronic self-sabotage
and the life of voracious human parasite.
